Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the image posted on social media shows Tree of Life mass shooting victim Rose Mallinger, when in fact it is a different person.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image posted is not of Rose Mallinger, but of Hungarian-born photographer Ata Kandó.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to verify the accuracy of the image.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image posted on social media is of Rose Mallinger without proper verification or evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanation for the misidentification of the image or the motives behind posting it.
